amendment.description: To expand assistance with coverage for legal immigrants under the Medicaid program and SCHIP to include citizens of the Freely Associated States.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 980 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 980 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S8330-8331; text: CR S8330) To expand assistance with coverage for legal immigrants under the Medicaid program and SCHIP to include citizens of the Freely Associated States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 980 proposed by Senator Akaka.
